1.0.name: wordpress/popup-shortlink
1.0.description:
PopUP Shortlink to display a small window displaying the URL with the API Bit.ly, the API TinyURL.com or the API 0Ab.fr when the visitor clicks on a link in an article. Visitor can continue his visit to the site if he clicks on close or continue.

It is possible to share the shortcut on different social networks like Twitter, Facebook, Del.Icio.Us...

For more information, you can watch this video : http://www.dailymotion.com/video/xio82q_popup-shortlink-un-reducteur-d-url-pour-wordpress
